description: Traditional fit with the addition of a tapered leg for a modern silhouette, the No Sweat Pant is crafted in their bestselling stretch fabric that’s designed to feel like your sweats with 5-pocket detailing for a polished, versatile look. Plant-rich fibres offer moisture management and antibacterial properties for less washing and comfort across seasons.
name: Duer No Sweat Pants Relaxed Tapered Fit, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 62% Cotton, 34% Tencel™ Lyocell, 3% Coolmax® Polyester, 1% Lycra® Spandex
Machine wash cold, inside out with like colours. Only use non-chlorine bleach when needed. Do not use silicone softeners. Tumble dry and warm iron when necessary.
